nodes.text: The Balnab were the inhabitants of the planet Balnab. They seemed to be survivors of a shipwreck. All known members were part of a tentacle-faced species.

By the time of the Clone Wars, they had inhabited a region on the planet, and followed a holographic figure, Albee Dewaw. However, unbeknownst to them, their so-called leader was not who he seemed. Some members of the group seemed to scour the land often, and on one trip, came across the droids C-3PO and R2-D2. They brought the droids to their residence, however their leader became furious and killed one of the Balnab. After R2-D2 found that Pit Droids were controlling a holographic Dewaw, the Balnab attacked and destroyed the droids' control room, creating a large explosion that possibly engulfed the inhabitants.
